recipe.title: Hearts of Palm Salad with Beets and Blue Cheese
ingredients: 1/2 14- to 15-ounce can hearts of palm, drained, each cut into 1/2-inch-thick rounds
1/2 large red bell pepper, halved lengthwise, thinly sliced crosswise
instructions: Combine all ingredients except dressing in large bowl; toss to blend. Add 1/2 cup dressing (or more); toss again to coat.
Combine all ingredients except dressing in large bowl; toss to blend. Add 1/2 cup dressing (or more); toss again to coat.
